Key Arguments: The bill resembles a 'communist style' approach to controlling information.
There is skepticism about who decides what constitutes misinformation and disinformation.
During the Covid pandemic, government sources provided misinformation, while accurate information from health experts was censored.
The government should be limited in its power, not given more control over information.
The bill gives too much power to a few individuals, which is dangerous and could cost lives.
Similar attempts at censorship in the US were deemed unconstitutional and anti-democratic.
Notable Quotes: We strongly oppose this communist style Bill.
Government approved speech, which the past proves will be the result of this Bill, is a dystopian nightmare with Ministry of Truth vibes.
